{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Ionics EMS |model=Cirrus |est_release_date=February 2011 |manuf_country=Philippines |is_manuf=No |type=plug computer |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_conn=AC |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6282 |cpu1_cspeed=2 GHz |fla1=512 MiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F4G08U0B-PCB0 |ram1=512 MiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T1G084QE |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA, |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag=yes,, USB Female Mini-B |serial=yes,, USB Female Mini-B |wi1_module=Samsung SWB-M12 |wi1_module_if=SDIO (module) |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8686 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1G |addl_chips=Programmable Current Limit High-Side Switch;Micrel;MIC2544;;1;,,, Quad 3-State Noninverting Buffer;ON Semiconductor;MC74HC125A;;1;,,, Dual USB to Serial UART/FIFO;FTDI;FT2232D;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.4.26;, |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31.5;Ubuntu 9.04 |802dot11_protocols=bg |oui_eth=00:26:DB }}
Composed of 5 circuit boards: * Power board * Processor Board silkscreened with "PLUG_COMPUTER_SP2.0_B00" * SATA Board silkscreened with "PLUG_COMPUTER_SP2.0_SATA_B00" * LED Board silkscreened with "SP2.0_LED_Board_Rev.B00" * WIFI/JTAG Board silkscreened with "SP2.0 WIFI/JTAG_Rev.B00" Contains 1.8" 120GB SATA Drive
